description:
From the tallest peaks to dog walks, these Xplore softshell will give you the flexibility to go anywhere. With its 4-way stretch and removable gaiter system, you can focus on the journey ahead.

  • Moisture wicking recycled polyester with spandex for stretch
  • PFC-free DWR finish gives peace of mind when light rain and snow come into the picture
  • Regular fit 4-way stretch lets you move how you want through the mountains
  • Front fly with button closure and belt loops make it look formal for those after work drinks
  • 2 slide-in pockets and 1 zippered pocket keeps things within reach when you need them
  • Removable gaiter system is light enough put on and stows away when conditions change
name: Terrex Xplore Year Round Pants - Men's
